item.title: Simplify Path
item.description:
Simplify Path LeetCode #71 Description Given an absolute path for a file (Unix-style), simplify it. For example, path = “/home/”, => “/home” path = “/a/./b/../../c/”, => “/c”
My Thoughts I will use stack to solve this problem. And there are some conditions that I will push or pop the stack: If I get nothing after “/”, do nothing. If I get “pathname/”, push “pathname/” into stack. If I get “.
